mainEntity.name: Are crash casino bonuses worth it?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, if you choose low-wagering bonuses (25x-35x) and have the bankroll to clear them. No, if you chase high-% bonuses with 50x+ wagering—most players never clear these.

mainEntity.name: What's a good wagering requirement for crash bonuses?

acceptedAnswer.text: Good: 25x-30x on bonus only. Acceptable: 30x-35x on bonus only. Avoid: 40x+ (unless the bonus % is very high).

mainEntity.name: Can I withdraw bonus money immediately?

acceptedAnswer.text: No. You must clear the wagering requirement first. Only after that can you withdraw bonus funds.

mainEntity.name: Do all crash games count toward bonus wagering?

acceptedAnswer.text: Not always. Check the T&Cs—some bonuses exclude certain crash games or providers. Look for "crash games contribute 100%."

mainEntity.name: What happens if I don't clear the wagering in time?

acceptedAnswer.text: You lose the bonus. Any remaining bonus funds (and winnings from them) will be forfeited when the bonus expires.

mainEntity.name: Can I claim multiple bonuses at once?

acceptedAnswer.text: Usually no. Most casinos only allow one active bonus at a time. Finish (or forfeit) your current bonus before claiming another.
